price: Dájúdájú Allāhu mọ ohunkóhun tí wọ́n ń pè lẹ́yìn Rẹ̀. Òun sì ni Alágbára, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yadʿūna min dūnihi min shayin wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
